meanings.definition: The quality or state of being green in color.
meanings.sent1: The forest's greenness was so vibrant and beautiful.
meanings.sent2: I love the greenness of the grass in the park.
meanings.sent3: The greenness of the paint made the room feel fresh and lively.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with the greenness of emeralds.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the greenness of nature in the painting.

meanings.sent1: The party was full of energy and greenness.
meanings.sent2: The greenness of the music got everyone dancing.
meanings.sent3: His jokes added a touch of greenness to the conversation.
meanings.sent4: The greenness of her spirit was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The greenness of the crowd at the concert was infectious.

meanings.sent1: His greenness in the business world was evident.
meanings.sent2: She had a certain charm due to her greenness in relationships.
meanings.sent3: The greenness of the new intern was endearing.
meanings.sent4: Their greenness in politics was refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The team's greenness brought a new perspective to the project.
